name: Venetica
description:
Venetica is a RPG game developed by Deck13 Interactive. It came out on 03-09-2010. Evolved Games published the game. Venetica has a Metascore of 50, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Venetica is available on PC, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
Jan Klose directed the game.
